name: The Queens Dreams: A Better View
description:
The outlook was grim.
The state was dire.
But somewhere, amongst the madness, there was a calm.
The still held beauty.
The gun battle had ceased long ago.
The murmurs of the forgotten cranes continued to buzz.
But now, even several months on the last remaining human life refused to come up and look.
Still they hid and feared the Sun.
All but one had the heart to lift their minds above the current view.
They did not know it was indeed a better one.
